Setting.Name: License::ExpirationNotification::DaysBeforeExpiry
Setting.Description: Number of days before license expiry to start showing notification (default 60 days = 2 months).

Setting.Name: License::ExpirationNotification::MessageTemplate
Setting.Description: Notification message template. Use %s as placeholder for days remaining.

Value.Item: Your license will be expiring in %s days. Please contact Motorola Solutions for service contract renewal.

Setting.Name: License::ExpirationNotification::ContactNumber
Setting.Description: Contact number to display in the notification.

Setting.Name: License::ExpirationNotification::ExpiredMessageTemplate
Setting.Description: Message to show when license has already expired.

Value.Item: Your license has expired. Please contact Motorola Solutions for license renewal.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Output::FilterContent###LicenseExpirationNotification
Setting.Description: Output filter to show license expiration notification.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Module###AgentLicenseNotificationDismiss
Setting.Description: Frontend module registration for AJAX license notification dismiss handler.

Hash.Item: AJAX handler for dismissing license notification.
